title: Prophets Of War - The Angel And The Hourglass  mp3  2014
description:
Prophets Of War - The Angel And The Hourglass  mp3  2014......Description
Progressive Black/Folk Metal for fans of Opeth, Insomnium, Gojira, Fleshgod Apocalypse, Orphaned Land, Alcest, Ghost Brigade, In Flames, Behemoth etc.

Dedicated to songwriting, Prophets of War is the continual realisation of the dream and passion of founding member, Paul Jeanrenaud.

Combining furious aggression, sweeping majesty & pristine purity, they weave an ornate tapestry through progressive black metal. Their powerful songs immerse the listener, taking them on a journey that leaves them breathless and wanting more.


Influences:

Alpine Fault, Opeth, Orphaned Land, Insomnium, Ghost Brigade, Alcest, Behemoth, In Flames, Fleshgod Apocalypse, Septicflesh, Gojira.


1. The Beginning Is Near
2. The Great Disguise
3. Conflicted Reality
4. Arena Holocaust
5. Time To Die
6. Through The Veil Of Separation
7. From Nothing
8. Stronger Than Hate

Prophets Of War - The Angel And The Hourglass (2014)



Paul Jeanrenaud: Vocals/Guitar
David Currie: Keys/Vocals/Guitar
Adrian Pagano: Bass Guitar/Vocals
Sean O'Brien: Guitar    ................More Stuff that sounds like what I like and if you come here you know I only like certain things numbers are cool but I am a Metal Hard rock uploader cause thats who I am, enjoy........
